channel.title: raspberrypi on LinuxUK
channel.description: Recent content in raspberrypi on LinuxUK

item.title: Monitoring a Greenhouse with Ubuntu
item.description: There are a wide range of solutions on the market today to help the avid gardener with their plants, some are low tech battery-less meters designed to give you a simple view of how your plant is doing, others are much more high-tech (and expensive). Two of the most important variables to monitor in a greenhouse are temperature and humidity, too hot and plants start to scorch and wilt, too cold and they can be damaged, and humidity is important for a whole host of plants you may find in a greenhouse.
